## 1. Introduction

### 1.1. Context & Motivation

- Dynamics of polycrisis [@delannoy2024dynamics]

- Objective: to investigate which shocks cause and are caused by EPP outbreaks, especifically outbreaks of human pathogens.

### 1.2. Research questions

- Does disease outbreak precede or follow other shocks?

- How persistent are the lagged effects of shocks on disease outbreak?

- How do these dynamics differ across spatial scales?
